section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: A'isha reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:There had been among the people before you inspired persons and if there were any such among my Umma Umar b. Khattab would be one of them. Ibn Wahb explained the word Muhaddathun as those who receive hint from the High (Mulhamun)
